已过时的 API

目录

  • 已过时的类
  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的类 
    类和说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestCase
    Write junit4 unit tests using HBaseTestingUtility
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.SecureBulkLoadEndpointClient
    Use for backward compatibility testing only. Will be removed when SecureBulkLoadEndpoint is not supported.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestHColumnDescriptor
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestHTableDescriptor

    方法和说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.RegionAsTable.checkAndDelete(byte[], byte[], byte[], CompareFilter.CompareOp, byte[], Delete)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.RegionAsTable.checkAndDelete(byte[], byte[], byte[], CompareOperator, byte[], Delete)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.RegionAsTable.checkAndMutate(byte[], byte[], byte[], CompareFilter.CompareOp, byte[], RowMutations)

    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.RegionAsTable.checkAndPut(byte[], byte[], byte[], CompareOperator, byte[], Put)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(byte[], byte[], byte[], String, Configuration, boolean, Durability, WAL, byte[]...)
    use #createLocalHRegion(TableName, byte[], byte[], boolean, Durability, WAL, byte[]...)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHTU()
    use HBaseTestingUtility.HBaseTestingUtility() instead
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHTU(Configuration)
    use HBaseTestingUtility.HBaseTestingUtility(Configuration) instead
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createMultiRegionsInMeta(Configuration, HTableDescriptor, byte[][])
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createMultiRegionsInMeta(Configuration, TableDescriptor, byte[][])
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(String)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(String, int, int, int, KeepDeletedCells)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MiniHBaseCluster.getClusterStatus()
    As of release 2.0.0, this will be removed in HBase 3.0.0 Use MiniHBaseCluster.getClusterMetrics() instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.getHBaseAdmin()
    Since 2.0. Will be removed in 3.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility.getAdmin() instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.getMetaTableDescriptor()
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.getMetaTableDescriptorBuilder()
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.RegionAsTable.getOperationTimeout()

    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.RegionAsTable.setWriteRpcTimeout(int)
